entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of drizzle or rain. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle this morning. Rain beginning early this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:47 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
